children.text: The plasterboard has not been glued and screwed adequately to the framing members, which has resulted in the sheets being drummy.
The Victorian Building Authority’s Guide to Standards and Tolerances clause 9.11 Plasterboard sheeting states that
‘The installation and jointing of plasterboard sheeting systems is defective if it does not conform to AS/NZS 2589 and the manufacturer’s installation instructions .
This item must be rectified in accordance with the above requirements.
